document.full_text: the chances for major flooding at many locations along the red river have grown, including the expectations for crests at fargo and grand forks in north dakota, the national weather service said on friday.
document.title: red river flooding forecasts increase across north dakota
lines_and_colors: the chances for major flooding at many locations along the red river have grown, including the expectations for crests at fargo and grand forks in north dakota, the national weather service said on friday.
